content: row rib 2 3 4 4 4 cast off 2sts rib 2 3 4 4 4 next row rib 3 4 5 5 5 cast on 2sts rib 2 3 4 4 4 work 3 row in rib cast off in rib with rs facing working on rem 23 26 29 32 34 sts slip first st onto a safety pin rejoin yarn to rem 22 25 28 31 33 sts and knit to end shape armhole next row cast off 4 4 4 5 5 sts purl to end 18 21 24 26 28 sts front next row k2tog neck edge knit to last 4sts k2tog k2 next row p2 p2tog purl to end 15 18 21 23 25 sts using 3 25mm needles thumb method cast repeat last 2 row once more 12 15 18 20 22 sts on 49 57 63 71 75 sts and work 7 7 7 9 9 row in 1x1 rib next row k2tog knit to last 4sts k2tog k2 10 13 15 18 20 sts next row rib 2 2 3 3 5 rib2tog rib 12 8 9 7 7 rib2tog 3 5 5 7 7 times rib 3 3 3 3 5 45 51 57 63 67 sts next row purl change to 4mm needles and working in st-st throughout cont repeat last 2 row 2 3 3 4 5 times more 6 7 10 10 10 sts until front measures 9 11 14 17 20 cm ending with a ws row *** shape armhole and divide for neck work 4 4 8 8 8 row decrease 1 st at neck edge only in 3rd and every foll 0 0 4th 4th 4th row 5 6 8 8 8 sts next row cast off 4 4 4 5 5 sts k17 20 23 25 27 sts turn leave rem 23 26 29 32 34 sts on a stitch holder working on work 6 8 6 6 8 row without shaping these 18 21 24 26 28 sts only proceed as follows - cast off next row purl next row k2 s1 k1 psso knit to last 2sts k2tog neck edge back next row purl to last 4sts p2togtbl p2 15 18 21 23 25 sts work exactly as given for front until *** is reached repeat last 2 row once more 12 15 18 20 22 sts shape armholes next row k2 s1 k1 psso knit to last 2sts k2tog cast off 4 4 4 5 5 sts at beg of next 2 row 37 43 49 53 57 sts 10 13 16 18 20 sts next row k2 s1 k1 psso knit to last 4sts k2tog k2 next row p2 p2tog purl to last 4sts p2togtbl p2 33 39 45 49 53 sts repeat last 2 row once more 29 35 41 45 49 sts change to 3 25mm needles and proceed as follows - next row knit to end increase 2 3 3 3 3 sts evenly across row
